PATIENT_ID: TEST_CLABSI_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-15 10:00:00
Central venous catheter in place, right subclavian.
CVL site clean and dry, no erythema.

[LAB] 2026-01-19 08:00:00
Blood culture positive for S. aureus.
Bacteremia confirmed from peripheral draw.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-19 10:00:00
Patient febrile, temperature 39.1 C.
Chills and rigors noted.
Suspected central line-associated bloodstream infection.
Blood culture positive, central line in place.
Hypotension noted, blood pressure 85/52.
